title: Ahead of State budget, resident welfare associations demand focus on civic infrastructure
content:
The State budget is approaching.
*   Resident Welfare Associations (RWAs) are making demands ahead of its announcement.
*   They are urging for a strong focus on civic infrastructure in the upcoming budget.

title: Tamil Nadu Chief Minister Stalin inspects ongoing work on sports complex in Tirupattur
content:
Here's the summary in 3 bullet points:

*   Tamil Nadu Chief Minister M.K. Stalin.
*   Inspected ongoing construction work.
*   At a sports complex in Tirupattur.

title: What has government laid down on AI labelling? | Explained
content:
The government has established specific requirements or guidelines concerning AI labelling.
*   These rules dictate how AI-generated content, products, or services should be identified or marked.
*   The article provides a detailed explanation of these new governmental policies and their implications.

title: Union, W.B. Education Ministers spar over NEP, funds
content:
Here's the summary in 3 bullet points:

*   Education Ministers from the Union (central) government and West Bengal have clashed.
*   A key point of dispute is the National Education Policy (NEP).
*   Differences also arose regarding funding and resource allocation.

title: State level wrestling tournament begins in Bihar
content:
A state-level wrestling tournament.
*   Is commencing in Bihar.
*   The competition has officially begun.

title: Karnataka govt. can give ‘water guarantee’ if Centre gives requisite permissions: DKS
content:
The Karnataka government is prepared to offer its citizens a 'water guarantee'.
*   This initiative is conditional on the Central government granting the necessary permissions.
*   DKS (presumably D.K. Shivakumar) states that the state can implement the guarantee once these approvals are received.

title: ISRO could relaunch PSLV by June or July: Jitendra Singh
content:
Here's the summary in 3 bullet points:

*   ISRO is considering relaunching its Polar Satellite Launch Vehicle (PSLV).
*   This potential relaunch is targeted for June or July.
*   The information was shared by Jitendra Singh.

title: Experts criticise Andhra Pradesh’s health budget allocation for 2026-27
content:
Here's the summary in 3 bullet points:

*   Experts are criticizing Andhra Pradesh's.
*   The subject of their criticism is the state's health budget allocation.
*   This specific allocation is for the fiscal year 2026-27.

title: Three MEMU trains in Kerala to add coaches from Feb. 23: Union Minister Suresh Gopi
content:
Three MEMU trains in Kerala are set to receive additional coaches.
*   The expansion of these trains will commence on February 23rd.
*   The announcement was made by Union Minister Suresh Gopi.

title: 10 Osmania University students booked following protest
content:
Here are 3 bullet points summarizing the headline:

*   Ten students from Osmania University
*   Have been booked by authorities
*   The booking occurred following a protest.
